name: Till death do us part (The Fifth King)
name_original: Till death do us part (The Fifth King)
description:
Till Death Do Us Part

The reaper is having trouble keeping the souls and corpses in the afterlife in check, as they rampage against him and try to come back to life.

Help him defend the wall to the realm using his servants and drag and drop them onto the grid as towers to punish either soul or body of each enemy. But beware and don't let them JOIN back TOGETHER...

Best played in fullscreen.

This game was created for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 by:

  • The Fifth King / Discord: The Fifth King#0005 / Programming and Design
  • Drumpack/ Discord: Smoker#3039 / Programming
  • DTN Music / Discord: DTNWG - Chris#3063 / Music
  • Ryanocerou5 / Discord: Ryanocerou5#3266 / Music and Sounds
  • Ghoul-Ghost / Discord: Ghoul-Ghost#9302 / Art
